description: We're getting signals that editors of many national media have come into possession of e-mail correspondence belonging to the one of the most important officials in the country. He used his unsafe, private email address so it wasn't really a tough nut to crack for hackers. We might be in a serious trouble if this information gets in the hands of foreign country's special forces not mentioning internal turmoil.

options.description: We should have listened to our counterintelligence agency...

title: Email leak
